text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-diastolicbp

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP72831-8 (Intravascular diastolic), PROPERTY = LP6847-0 (Pres), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7034-4 (Arterial system) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP304516-0 (Intravascular diastolic^sitting), PROPERTY = LP6847-0 (Pres), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7034-4 (Arterial system) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP304518-6 (Intravascular diastolic^supine), PROPERTY = LP6847-0 (Pres), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7034-4 (Arterial system) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP304517-8 (Intravascular diastolic^standing), PROPERTY = LP6847-0 (Pres), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7034-4 (Arterial system) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP304501-2 (Intravascular diastolic^lying in L-lateral position), PROPERTY = LP6847-0 (Pres), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7034-4 (Arterial system) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)

name: VitalSignsDiastolicBP
title: Vital Signs - Diastolic BP
description: This value set defines the set of LOINC codes considered to be appropriate for representing an arterial diastolic BP vital sign measurement in Observation.component.code.
